title: Important things to tell a doctor
context: Inform the physician about a major medical issue or concern.

content.bestLine: I'm experiencing severe chest pain and difficulty breathing

neutral.text: I have a concern about my health
I need to discuss my symptoms
I want to talk about my medical history
I have a question about my treatment

formal.text: I would like to report a significant health issue
I am experiencing symptoms that require attention
I need to inform you of a serious medical concern
I require guidance on managing my condition
I would appreciate your expertise on this matter

patterns.template: I am experiencing [options] and need your help
patterns.meaning: Seeking medical attention for a serious issue

patterns.template: I have a [options] that I want to discuss with you
patterns.meaning: Initiating a conversation about a health issue

dialogs.description: Patient informing doctor about a major medical issue
